projects.name: June 18 2025 Event Campaign
projects.description: Client appreciation event featuring Cubs photographers at American Airlines Conference Center with 58 confirmed attendees
projects.venue: American Airlines Conference Center - Home Plate Room & Outdoor Terrace

tasks.title: Secure Event Venue
tasks.description: Booked American Airlines Conference Center - Home Plate Room & Outdoor Terrace at 1101 W. Waveland Ave, Chicago, IL 60613

tasks.title: Confirm Featured Speakers
tasks.description: Secured Stephen Green (Cubs photographer 1982-2022), Paul Natkin (moderator), and Ron Vesely as speakers

tasks.title: Design Event Schedule
tasks.description: Created detailed 4-hour timeline: 5:30 PM reception, 6:00 PM panel, 7:00 PM Cubs game viewing, 9:30 PM conclusion

tasks.title: Plan Catering Menu
tasks.description: Finalized comprehensive menu: salad bar, hot dogs, sliders, antipasti, crudit√©, ice cream bar, beer & wine package

tasks.title: Calculate Event Budget
tasks.description: Detailed cost breakdown completed: $16,717.72 total (food $4,980, beverage $2,625, service/rental $6,200, taxes/fees $2,912.72)

tasks.title: Plan Room Configuration
tasks.description: Designed theater-style seating for panel (6-7 PM) transitioning to cocktail tables for game viewing (7-9:30 PM)

tasks.title: Coordinate A/V Requirements
tasks.description: Arranged built-in screen/projector, 2 TVs for Cubs game, wireless mics, MacBook connectivity, WiFi access

tasks.title: Send Initial Invitations
tasks.description: Invitations sent to client database - confirmed 58 attendees of 75 capacity (77% response rate)

tasks.title: Final RSVP Follow-up
tasks.description: Send reminder emails and make follow-up calls to maximize attendance

tasks.title: Event Day Materials Preparation
tasks.description: Prepare name tags, welcome packets, speaker bios, and event signage

tasks.title: Coordinate Day-of Logistics
tasks.description: Final venue walkthrough, staff briefing, and contingency planning

tasks.title: Post-Event Follow-up
tasks.description: Thank you emails, feedback survey, and event photo sharing

tasks.title: Event Success Analysis
tasks.description: Analyze attendance, feedback, and ROI for future event planning
